name: Virucide
description:
Chad is an elite white blood cell operative with a peculiarly insatiable tendency. Now, with a new and unknown infection spreading out of control, he can once again indulge his manic hunger to commit Virucide.

This project is in early development and therefore has many incomplete assets and features. The primary purpose of this demo build is to playtest the game's feel and mechanics.

So if you have the itch to punch some COVID-19 in the face,  feel free to download and see what's brewing. Feedback in the comment section is very welcome and appreciated.

Happy Hunting!
